title: Add Gemini agent support (parity with Claude and Codex)
description:
The TerminalAgentLauncher.kt already lists GEMINI as an agent provider option but the scripts likely don't have Gemini-specific configuration. Audit and add:
1. Gemini CLI system prompt injection method
2. MCP config format for Gemini
3. Role doc delivery mechanism

This ensures all 3 supported agent types work correctly.

Files:
- scripts/moe-agent.sh
- scripts/moe-agent.ps1
- moe-jetbrains/src/main/kotlin/com/moe/util/TerminalAgentLauncher.kt
definitionOfDone: Gemini agent launch path documented or implemented in both scripts
Role instructions delivered to Gemini using its native mechanism
MCP config correctly generated for Gemini
